items.sentence: Tom rinsed out his mug and then refilled it with coffee.
Tom said that nothing like that would ever happen again.
Tom said that school did little to prepare him for life.
Tom sat down next to Mary and they smiled at each other.
We don\'t have enough money to go to Boston by airplane.
By the time the ambulance arrived, Tom was already dead.
I don\'t believe half of what I\'ve been told about you.
Please fasten your seat belt during takeoff and landing.
Please fill out this form and wait for us to notify you.
I had stuff to do so I didn\'t have time to feel lonely.
